name: y.a.n.a.
description:
y.a.n.a.

Am I Dreaming? Sitting up in your bed you feel the night wrap tightly around you.
Am I Alone? There is just emptiness where your friends should be.
As you turn to the low moonlight coming from the windows you can feel a movement behind you.
You turn reach out. Then the world begins to light up.
Somewhere else you can hear noises in the darkness.

credits

First game ever made by us, for our first game-jam.

Jessica, Jeremy, Stefan
